鹰角

鹰角网络（HyperGryph，日:ハイパーグリフ）是一家网络游戏研发运营公司，上海鹰角网络科技有限公司（Shanghai HyperGryph Network Technology Co.,Ltd.）旗下。因开发并运营了手机游戏《明日方舟》而闻名。
HyperGryph (Japanese: ハイパーグリフ) is an online game R&D and operation company, owned by Shanghai HyperGryph Network Technology Co., Ltd. Known for developing and operating the mobile game Arknight


鹰角网络主要由海猫和阵面、悠星的朋友创立。于2017年1月24日成立公司，公司经营范围包括从事网络、计算机技术领域内的技术开发、利用信息网络经营游戏产品等。
HyperGryph was mainly founded by 海猫 and friends of 阵面 and 悠星(Yostar). Founded on January 24, 2017, the company’s business scope includes technology development in the field of network and computer technology, and the use of information network to operate game products.


公司的两位创始人（海猫络合物、唯@W）毕业自中国美术学院建筑艺术学院（09届、05届），核心成员中也有不少来自中国美术学院的校友（13届综合设计系、13届美术教育系）。部分成员来自谷歌、无极黑、Cygames等公司。
The two founders of the company (海猫络合物、唯@W) graduated from the School of Architecture and Art of the China Academy of Art (09th and 05th), and many of the core members are alumni from the China Academy of Art (13th Comprehensive Design Department and 13th Art Education Department). Some members come from Google, Massive Black, Cygames and other companies.


目前公司分为两大部门，研发和发行。研发分为策划组、美术组、程序组、文案组和内容组，发行包括运营组等。策划组下有关卡策划和系统策划，主要负责玩家在游戏体验时的具体感受；美术组负责概念设计、角色和场景原画、小人spine、3D战斗场景、UI和演出特效和基建平面装饰元素；程序组负责底层架构、工具效能、战斗机制、角色逻辑、外层系统、中层玩法、本地化和图形渲染；文案组主要负责游戏剧情的文字创作；内容组负责漫画、小说、音乐、动画和PV等在游戏外扩展作品世界观的作品，同时也与各地的优秀艺术家合作（包括角色设计、插画、漫画、动画和小说等）；运营组主要负责处理玩家对游戏的反馈、游戏内活动排期和规划、市场活动和游戏衍生品开发等。
At present, the company is divided into two departments, R&D and distribution. R&D is divided into planning team, art team, program team, copywriting team and content group, and distribution includes operation team. The planning team is mainly responsible for the specific feelings of players during the game experience; The art team is responsible for concept design, character and scene original art, villain spine, 3D battle scenes, UI and performance special effects, and infrastructure graphic decoration elements; The program group is responsible for the underlying architecture, tool effectiveness, combat mechanics, character logic, external system, mid-level gameplay, localization and graphics rendering; The copywriting team is mainly responsible for the text creation of the game plot; The content team is responsible for manga, novels, music, animation, PV and other works that expand the world view of the work outside the game, and also collaborates with outstanding artists around the world (including character design, illustration, manga, animation, novels, etc.); The operation team is mainly responsible for handling player feedback on the game, in-game event scheduling and planning, marketing activities and game derivative development.

title: QiQue
content:
个人的第一篇博客，曾经有多次要做记录的意向，奈何三分钟热度，在特殊时期(2023-9)的情况下，开坑准备写博客，我不清楚写博客的习惯会持续多久，但我不会后悔有过这样一段经历，这是我亲自开启的故事。（尽量尝试双语写作）
This is my first blog, once I own lots intentions of recording, however 3-minute passion is hard to conquer, during a special time (2023-9), begin to write blogs, I don’t know how long can I keep, but I will never to regert holding such an experience, afterall it’s the story that open up in person.


致读者 To Readers
我不确定这些博客未来将会被哪些人看到, 但我确定这些博客的受众不仅仅只是我一个人. 也许只有我一个人在这里缅怀自己或抒发一些奇思妙想, 但我相信读者能从这些记录中了解我这个平凡的普通人.
多数情况下,会是未来的自己对自我的经历进行审视,回归当年的自己,你是否能坦然接受呢? 也许有天会和我未来的另一半一起翻看这些博客,记录过我的一个个奇妙经历,也许会在若干年后,我的孩子能通过这一篇篇的博客了解当今的我, 也许新的年轻一代也没有记录博客的习惯, 或许未来电脑也不一定支持解析出这篇文章. 无论如何希望读者能在这些博客中找到自己的收获.
I’m not sure these blogs will be read by those person, but i’m sure I am not the only one to see these blogs. Maybe the blogs contains my own emotions and some fantastic thoughts and wonders, but I do believe readers can learn more about me the person the ordinary one.
In most circumstances, there will be myself to review me and remind the old one, I wonder if the new one will accept the old one easily? Maybe someday I will review these  blogs recorded my special experiences with my mate. Maybe someday my children will get familiar with me through these blogs. Maybe the young don’t have customary to write blogs, maybe future compute system couldn’t support this file. No matter who visit these, I hope you can harvest something.
缘由 Reason
主要的原因可能是最近看到的一种现象:
随着年龄的增长,每一天的体感长度在逐渐降低,年轻时的一天在自己人生中的尺度占比要远高于当前一天在自我阅历中的占比,希望这种记录的方式也能一定程度减少自己的困惑吧.
The main Reason could be the phenomenon observed recently:
With days goes by, the feelings about one day gradually decrease, when I was young, the feeling about one day has larger than the feeling about one day now, I hope some confuse could be decrease partly in this way.
权重 Wight
我一直坚信一个道理,虽然人人生而平等,但是不得不说,每个人都伴随这独属于自己的”权重”, 权重来源于每个人不同的生活经历、周围的环境和个人的努力，以及一点小小的运气。 
或者以另一种方式而言，每个人都是一个人的个体的生活经历作用的结果，周围的环境造就了一个人的成绩，其中也包含了每个人在环境中做出的选择，是二者共同的作用促成了人的完整个体。
在当今社会,一个人是注定无法成功的,需要不断的借势和合作,甚至是掠夺才能达到一定的成绩。
I have insist on motto, even everyone are equality, but it has to be said everyone has it’s own “wight” which come from one’s life experience, the surroundings who live  in, the personal hard work, and some luck.
In another way said, everyone is the result of it’s life experience, the whole surroundings make a person great, this is also caused by one’s choice, this two make a person full.
In nowadays, one couldn’t success without the help from greater one and cooperation, even you need to plunder something can make you get it.
箴言 Motto

只有知识永远不会背叛你。

Only knowledge will never betray you.

北海,要多想

Beihai, think more.

犹豫就会败北,果断就会白给

Hesitation will make you lose, decisiveness will be given for nothing.

我与昨日离去,走时心如止水;我与今早醒来,来时心怀暖阳

I left last day with heart stops like water, I wake up today with full warm in the heart.

层楼终究误少年,自由早晚乱余生,你我山前没相见,山后别相逢

Fancey world will delay young, free will cause confusion of part life, you and I couldn't meet before, wish we have our own parallel roads.

人终究被年少不可得之物困其一生,奈何东方吹破少年梦,岁月磨平英雄心

Man will finally confused by the untouchable thing appearing young, but the sociaty will blow young's dream, time will make person ordinary

亦余心之所善兮,虽九死其犹未悔

For the ideal that I hold dear to my heart, I’d not regret a thousand times to die.

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
More skills will be Irregularly added.

Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
Skills about writingcreate new blogThis is same with part ONE, it should be created by GIT BASH with administer’s rights.
$ hexo new "BLOG NAME"

add categoriesCategories is the only key in each article, this need to be considered carefully, besides, categorites can be used to classify articles.
The information about how to deploy the new categories and new tags comes from the article with this links set tags and categories.


create the categories item



This need to been done before add category in every article.
In the main file path of BLOG:(GIT BASH terminal)
$ hexo new page "categories"

Later you will find the index.md in blog/source/"categories"/ path.
Open the index.md, it shows like:
---title: LEARNdate: 2023-09-06 21:02:19---

Then you need add code as follow:
type: "categories"

Finally, it likes:
---title: LEARNdate: 2023-09-06 21:02:19type: "categories"---

Save the file and add new categories in target article like this:
BEFORRE
---title: Hello World---

AFTER
---title: Hello Worldcategories: - LEARN---

If we add another categories like this:
categories:- LEARN- XXX

This doesn’t mean the article Hello World belongs Categories LEARN and XXX, this means the article belongs the Categories XXX and Categories XXX belongs to Categories LEARN. It looks like the Windows file systerm.

each file can only belong to one folder

add tagsIt’s similar with Categories.
GIT BASH
$ hexo new page tags

Find index.md in path blog/source/tags/
Add code 
type: "tags" 

After the whole index.md
---title: tagsdate: 2023-09-06 21:04:30type: "tags"---

Then you can add tags in target article with code below:
tags: - help- example


Articles may have lots of tags, but they could hold one Category

Seems like the file’s shortcut.
